objects.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_getUserLocale
objects.description: Gets the Appian user locale as defined in the user preferences, returns the default if the user is null

objects.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_isUserLocaleEnglishUs
objects.description: Returns true if the user's locale is en_US, which is English, United States

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_cast
objects.description: Casts a variable to the type of either the input `type`, or the typeof of the input `typeof`, and properly handles for null inputs

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_checkIfUserExists
objects.description: Returns true if the user exists

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_displayUser
objects.description: Returns a display name for a user in the format of "firstName lastName". Null-safe.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_formatDateTime
objects.description: Formats a date time for read-only text display using the loggedInUser's timezone. Note, do not use this rule to format dates, only date times. Returns text.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_indexPath
objects.description: Pass in a field (i.e. member[1].name) and this will index(index(index( for each field

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_isBlank
objects.description: Evaluates if the provided value is empty/blank. Returns True or False.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank
objects.description: A not() wrapped around AS_CO_UT_isBlank

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_queryEntity
objects.description: Helper rule to execute queries with minimal overhead, pass `returnType` based on the query purpose

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_queryRecord
objects.description: Helper rule to execute record queries with minimal overhead, pass `returnType` based on the query purpose

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray
objects.description: Removes null values from an array of primitive types or CDTs (for CDT the index must be null, not each field)

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_replaceNull
objects.description: Returns nullableValue only if it is not null. Else returns replacementValue.

objects.name: AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
objects.description: Displays a label by the `bundleKey` from passed in bundle data, optionally accepts arguments

objects.name: AS_GAM_UT_ArrayLength
objects.description: Gives length of an array based on input of array

objects.name: AS_GCM_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder
objects.description: Loads a property bundle file by name from a folder, returns a dictionary of the key-value pairs

objects.name: AS_GCM_DPL_CO_UI_userImageAndDisplayNameGridColumns
objects.description: GCM specific rule - Returns two grid columns, the first containing a user's image and the second containing their name.  Should only be used in gridFields with a borderStyle of LIGHT

objects.name: AS_GCM_DSP_displayAuditActionCodeText
objects.description: Given an audit action code, creates a rich text item of the correct color and text to describe the action for requirement audit

objects.name: AS_GCM_DSP_displayAuditModificationForQuestionnaireTemplate
objects.description: Returns formatting for modification field on questionnaire template audit grid

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_QE_getQuestionnaireTemplateAudits
objects.description: Returns Questionnaire Template audit details based on the given filter set

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_QR_getQuestionCategories
objects.description: Query expression to return all rows of AS GCM QNM T Question Category

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_QR_getQuestionPrecedent
objects.description: returns AS GCM QNM T Question Precedent record type for given questionTemplateId_precedent

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_QR_getQuestion_Template
objects.description: Query to return the template questions (AS GCM QNM T Question)

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_QR_getQuestionnaire_Template
objects.description: Query expression for AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire

objects.name: AS_GCM_QNM_REF_responseRequirements
objects.description: List of dictionaries populated with metadata/rules for each response requirement type

objects.name: AS_GCM_UT_constructAuditCommentForQuestionnaireTemplateFields
objects.description: Returns constructed audit comment for each Questionnaire Template field

objects.name: AS_GCM_UT_displayFieldNamesForQuestionnaireTemplateAuditHistory
objects.description: Gives the displayable names for the field names in questionnaire template audit history ( Add the fields that needs to be shown in the history)

objects.name: AS_GCM_UT_queryRecordByIdentifier
objects.description: Helper rule to execute record queries with minimal overhead

objects.name: AS_GCM_filterRecords
objects.description: Filters, rejects, or returns matching indices of a list of records by field-value filter combinations.

objects.name: AS_GCM_DPL_CO_DSP_userImageDisplayField
objects.description: GCM specific rule- image field for user images

objects.name: AS_GCM_DSP_displayModificationCommentForQuestionCategory
objects.description: Displays modification comment for Question Category in audit history

objects.name: AS_GCM_DSP_displayModificationCommentForQuestionTemplate
objects.description: Displays modification comment for Question template in audit history

objects.name: AS_GCM_DSP_displayModificationCommentForQuestionTemplatePrecedentResponses
objects.description: Displays modification comment for Questions Precedents Responses in audit history

objects.name: AS_GCM_DSP_displayModificationCommentForQuestionTemplatePrecedents
objects.description: Displays modification comment for Questions Precedents in audit history

objects.name: AS_GCM_DSP_modificationCommentForQuestionnaireTemplateAudit
objects.description: Displays modification comment for Questionnaire template history
